snippet: Chelsea’s John Terry was cleared in court of racially abusing Anton Ferdinand, but hard feelings persist in a new Premier League season in England.
lead_paragraph: Chelsea’s John Terry was cleared in court of racially abusing Anton Ferdinand, but hard feelings persist in a new Premier League season in England.

headline.seo: In England, Ferdinand Ignores Terry Before Game
headline.main: Anton Ferdinand Refuses to Shake Terry’s Hand
headline.print_headline: Anton Ferdinand Refuses to Shake Terry’s Hand
